location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '18'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of the SS Mantuaat Aden. The steamship is in the centre of the photograph with a tug boat alongside the stern. Two further large boats are visible behind and alongside the steamer at right. Immediately right of centre a small boat is visible in the distant middle-ground. A bird flies across the scene at left.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Aden.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘17’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘S.S. "Mantua"’,‘(Dec. 1926)’
